body_html:
@Fr-d-rik hi!
The way that I was able to found - remove Variable initialization from the scan step. I do not know is this a case for you, but I had something like

var = tf.Variable(...)

inside the step. Once I removed it outside the step, by announcing earlier and just accessing inside, error disappeared.
Hope it can help you
body:
@Fr-d-rik hi!
The way that I was able to found - remove Variable initialization from the scan step. I do not know is this a case for you, but I had something like

```
var = tf.Variable(...)
```

inside the step. Once I removed it outside the step, by announcing earlier and just accessing inside, error disappeared.
Hope it can help you
